moTa: The Chevrolet Bolt EV is available as a wagon and SUV. The 2018 Bolt EV starts at $36,620 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $875. It gets EPA-estimated 120 MPG combined. The Chevrolet Bolt EV competes against models like the Volvo V60, Volkswagen Golf Alltrack, and Volvo V60 Cross Country.

The Chevrolet Camaro is available as a convertible and coupe. The 2018 Camaro starts at $25,905 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $995. It gets EPA-estimated 16-25 MPG combined. The Chevrolet Camaro competes against models like the BMW 440, Chevrolet Corvette, and Lexus LC 500h. The Camaro is a good fit for sun lovers Sun Lover vehicles have convertible tops or removable roofs. May require specific trim level and/or optional features. .

The Chevrolet Cruze competes against models like the Mazda Mazda6, Honda Civic, and Nissan Sentra. The Cruze is a good fit for eco-friendly shoppers Eco-Friendly vehicles have a minimum EPA-estimated mileage of 35 mpg combined and include hybrids, diesels and even a few fuel-sipping gas-only cars. The Chevrolet Silverado 1500 is a full-size, light-duty, half-ton pickup truck with heavy-duty 2500 and 3500 models augmenting the lineup for towing and hauling needs. Combined, Silverado is GM’s best-selling nameplate and usually takes second place in overall U.S. vehicle sales. Like most pickups, it’s available in various cab configurations, cargo bed lengths and trim levels, ranging from rubber-floored work trucks to premium models for the growing personal-use market. Engine choices have typically been a V-6 and at least two V-8s. The Silverado 1500 shares mechanical underpinnings with GM’s other half-ton pickup, the GMC Sierra 1500. The Silverado 1500 is a good fit for off road shoppers Off-Road vehicles include four-wheel-drive SUVs and pickup trucks with the extra feature of a dual-range transfer case or dedicated crawl mode for extreme off-road driving. May require specific trim level and/or optional features. and towing Towing vehicles can tow a minimum of 2,000 pounds (see specifications for maximum). May require specific trim level and/or optional features. .
